May contain spoilers from The Enmity Cycle **Source** [The Enmity Cycle](/Sources.aspx?ID=200) pg. 61 **Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283) **Area** 60-foot cone **Saving Throw** Reflex --- You throw a handful of sand that transforms into jagged shards of glass. Creatures in the area take 4d6 slashing damage and must attempt a Reflex save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target takes half damage.
**Failure** The target takes full damage and 1 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
**Critical Failure** The target takes double damage and 2 persistent bleed damage. --- **Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
